Uses of Class
it.unipd.dei.se.parse.DocumentParser

Packages that use DocumentParser
Package Description
it.unipd.dei.se.index
This package indexes a document corpus.
it.unipd.dei.se.parse
This package provides parsers for the TIPSTER corpus and could be exploited to write parsers for other corpora.
